data.name: DIRT 5 - Gameplay Booster Pack
data.detailed_description: Kick start your career in the DIRT Off-Road Series with the gameplay booster pack - increasing your XP and currency gains permanently! To use this pack, you must own DIRT 5.
data.about_the_game: Kick start your career in the DIRT Off-Road Series with the gameplay booster pack - increasing your XP and currency gains permanently! To use this pack, you must own DIRT 5.
data.short_description: Kick start your career in the DIRT Off-Road Series with the gameplay booster pack - increasing your XP and currency gains permanently! To use this pack, you must own DIRT 5.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
